description:
The Leading Java and Kotlin IDE

Code-centric IDE, focused on your productivity. Full Java EE support, deep code understanding, best debugger, refactorings, everything right out of the box...
IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3 EAP 7 is out, featuring the following updates:
- AI-generated titles and descriptions for merge and pull requests
- A heap memory usage graph in the profiler
- Debugger improvements
Find all the details in our blog post.
